alert.note: Alert for Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 01 at 2:34PM CST until March 01 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Lea and Central Lea Counties. In Texas, Gaines County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
